thread.title: Top Israeli official's wife sorry for racist Obama joke
thread.title_full: Top Israeli official's wife sorry for racist Obama joke

author: kballuck@thehill.com (Mark Hensch)
title: Top Israeli official's wife sorry for racist Obama joke
text:
June 21, 2015, 02:49 pm Top Israeli official's wife sorry for racist Obama joke By Mark Hensch Getty Images 
The wife of Israeli Interior Minister Silvan Shalom apologized on Sunday for tweeting a racist joke about President Obama. Israeli interior minister's wife @JudyMozes tweets 'racist' joke about #Obama , causing furor http://t.co/jh7EzU6iSD pic.twitter.com/SEwKgrq8P8 — Haaretz.com (@haaretzcom) June 21, 2015 
Israeli television host Judy Shalom Nir-Mozes, who said she regretted the quip, faced strong criticism for it online. President Obama I shouldnt have written the inappropriate joke I heard. I like people no matter about their race and religion. — Judy Mozes (@JudyMozes) June 21, 2015 I apologize, that was a stupid joke somebody told me. — Judy Mozes (@JudyMozes) June 21, 2015 
Nir-Mozes has since deleted the offending post, according to Haaretz . 
The paper noted that her husband is responsible for overseeing strategic dialogue between Israel and the U.S. 
Tensions between both nations have already become strained recently over a proposed deal over Iran’s nuclear arms research. 
President Obama and Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu disagree over how the global community should handle Iran’s pursuit of nuclear weapons. Tags:
